resources.string: This simple application allows you to choose a web browser from the installed ones when opening links - something that was made impossible in recent Android versions.
To work properly it needs to be made the default browser. This would allow to open links from other apps in the same way.

There is no tracking or analysis of your interaction with this app, it doesn\'t send any information to any third-parties (doesn\'t even use internet permission). On top of that the full source code is available online.
